content:
Hi - I am trying to build the PDDI CDS IG (https://github.com/HL7/PDDI-CDS) with the newest IG publisher and have this new error -- can someone help suggest how I can get around it? 

Installing hl7.fhir.uv.pddi#0.1.0 to the package cache
  Fetching:..
  Installing: .. done.
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.Utilities.pathURL(Utilities.java:644)
    at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.PackageClient.fetch(PackageClient.java:97)
    at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.BasePackageCacheManager.loadFromPackageServer(BasePackageCacheManager.java:72)
    at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadFromPackageServer(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:214)
    at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.FilesystemPackageCacheManager.loadPackage(FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java:477)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.PreviousVersionComparator.startChecks(PreviousVersionComparator.java:194)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.checkConformanceResources(Publisher.java:3701)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadConformance(Publisher.java:3652)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:851)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:712)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:7845)
check profiles                                                                   (01:12:34.0028)
process CodeSystem: codesystem-PDDICDS-indicator                                 (01:12:34.0030)
Publishing Content Failed: null                                                  (01:12:34.0063)
                                                                                 (01:12:34.0064)
Use -? to get command line help                                                  (01:12:34.0067)
                                                                                 (01:12:34.0069)
Stack Dump (for debugging):                                                      (01:12:34.0072)
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.PreviousVersionComparator.finishChecks(PreviousVersionComparator.java:227)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.checkConformanceResources(Publisher.java:3726)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadConformance(Publisher.java:3652)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:851)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:712)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:7845)
@Rich Boyce why is the txCache not committed to the git repo for this IG?
